content.text: Match ends, Montpellier 1, FC Schalke 04 1.
Second Half ends, Montpellier 1, FC Schalke 04 1.
Foul by Lewis Holtby (FC Schalke 04).
Younès Belhanda (Montpellier) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Benedikt Höwedes (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Younès Belhanda (Montpellier).
Attempt saved. Emanuel Herrera (Montpellier) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Henri Bedimo with a cross.
Attempt missed. Romain Pitau (Montpellier) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left following a corner.
Corner,  Montpellier. Conceded by Timo Hildebrand.
Attempt saved. Emanuel Herrera (Montpellier) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Romain Pitau.
Corner,  Montpellier. Conceded by Christoph Metzelder.
Offside, FC Schalke 04. Jermaine Jones tries a through ball, but Klaas-Jan Huntelaar is caught offside.
Substitution, FC Schalke 04. Chinedu Obasi replaces Teemu Pukki.
Hilton (Montpellier) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Hilton (Montpellier).
Teemu Pukki (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, FC Schalke 04. Lewis Holtby tries a through ball, but Teemu Pukki is caught offside.

Substitution, FC Schalke 04. Klaas-Jan Huntelaar replaces Ciprian Marica.

Foul by Sead Kolasinac (FC Schalke 04).
Rémy Cabella (Montpellier) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Marco Estrada (Montpellier) left footed shot from long range on the left is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by John Utaka.
Attempt missed. Sead Kolasinac (FC Schalke 04) left footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Tranquillo Barnetta.
Attempt blocked. Tranquillo Barnetta (FC Schalke 04) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Julian Draxler.
Substitution, Montpellier. John Utaka replaces Souleymane Camara.
Substitution, Montpellier. Younès Belhanda replaces Anthony Mounier.
Attempt blocked. Anthony Mounier (Montpellier) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked.
Attempt saved. Rémy Cabella (Montpellier) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marco Estrada.
Attempt saved. Rémy Cabella (Montpellier) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Souleymane Camara.
Attempt missed. Emanuel Herrera (Montpellier) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Marco Estrada.
Attempt missed. Marco Estrada (Montpellier) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Anthony Mounier.
Attempt missed. Emanuel Herrera (Montpellier) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Romain Pitau.
Goal!  Montpellier 1, FC Schalke 04 1. Emanuel Herrera (Montpellier) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom right corner.
Attempt blocked. Emanuel Herrera (Montpellier) header from very close range is blocked. Assisted by Anthony Mounier with a cross.
Corner,  FC Schalke 04. Conceded by Souleymane Camara.

Goal!  Montpellier 0, FC Schalke 04 1. Benedikt Höwedes (FC Schalke 04) header from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Christoph Metzelder with a headed pass following a set piece situation.
Teemu Pukki (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
